name: Peas Be With You
description:
The theme was "Peace", but I subverted it slightly to "Peas".

The idea of the game is to reunited a pea with the rest of his pea family. In a full game there would be more obstacles and puzzles, and more locations. I would also consider "collecting" each family member individually, and making a chain/trail of peas that would needed to be moved around safely.
